alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Greene; Martin; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 07 at 6:53PM EDT until April 07 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL GREENE...PITT...MARTIN AND NORTHWESTERN BEAUFORT COUNTIES... At 652 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lewiston Woodville to Black Jack, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Winterville, Williamston, Farmville, Bethel, Stokes, Bell Arthur, Robersonville, Pactolus, House, Bruce, Maury, Ormondsville, Roundtree, Lizzie, Old Ford, Pitt Greenville Airport, Dowdy Ficklen Stadium, East Carolina University and Gold Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
